long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GoTailwind is a cutting-edge browser extension designed to simplify your web development workflow by converting traditional CSS properties into equivalent Tailwind CSS classes. This tool integrates seamlessly into your browser, providing a quick and efficient way to adopt Tailwind's utility-first framework.

By leveraging GoTailwind, you can effortlessly transform CSS rules into their Tailwind counterparts, streamlining the process of modernizing your web projects. This extension is perfect for developers who are transitioning to Tailwind CSS or those who want to speed up their development process.

Key Features:
- Instant Conversion: Enter CSS properties and receive the corresponding Tailwind CSS classes instantly.
- Local Storage: Remembers your last entered value, making it easy to pick up where you left off.
- With V1.2, you can now see the colors properties.

GoTailwind supports a wide range of CSS properties, ensuring you can convert layouts, spacing, typography, and more with ease. For a complete list of supported properties, please visit our website or check the extension's documentation.

We value your feedback, including suggestions and bug reports, to enhance the functionality and user experience of GoTailwind. Your input is essential for us to continually improve this tool and adapt it to the evolving needs of the web development community.
